pr_title: CDPCP-2678. Support syncing service principle cloud ids

timeline.author: handavid
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -272,6 +273,26 @@ public void deleteMachineUser(String machineUserName, String userCrn, Optional<S
         }
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Retrieves list of an environments service principal cloud identities from UMS.
+     *
+     * @param accountId       the account Id
+     * @param envrionmentCrn  the envrionment crn
+     * @param requestId       an optional request Id
+     * @return list of service principal cloud identities
+     */
+    public List<ServicePrincipalCloudIdentities> listServicePrincipalCloudIdentities(String actorCrn, String accountId, String envrionmentCrn,

timeline.bodyText: I recently added paging to the listWorkloadAdministrationGroupsForMember API. I put the paging support in the GrpcUmsClient class instead of the UmsClient class because it was pretty much impossible to unit test in the UmsClient. I suggest moving the paging code to GrpcUmsClient
timeline.author: handavid

replies.bodyText: Ahh I see. I've moved it there and added a unit test.
replies.author: aarman-cloudera

timeline.author: handavid

replies.bodyText: Good catch, I meant to delete that one.
replies.author: aarman-cloudera

timeline.message:
CDPCP-2678. Support syncing service principle cloud ids

The ums client has been updated to allow listing cloud id assignments
for service principles This is used to sync the azure object ids
associated with service principles.
